description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5124l","text":"This protocol describes designing sgRNAs for genes of interest using the GEARBOCS vector backbone. This method allows researchers to utilize the GEARBOCS system for astrocyte-specific genetic manipulation in CRISPR/Cas9 mice for in vivo assays","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

fork_info.title: Designing sgRNA Oligos and Inserting Guides into the GEARBOCS Vector

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9nntc","text":"Use UCSC to get gene's exons and introns. Make sure the area you are targeting is in all isoforms.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":4,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":4}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"2659D31C7CE711EF93050A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://genome.ucsc.edu/cgi-bin/hgGene?hgg_gene=ENSMUST00000191899.6\u0026hgg_chrom=chr9\u0026hgg_start=108081832\u0026hgg_end=108141157\u0026hgg_type=knownGene\u0026db=mm39"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4ag3j","text":"Before designing your own guides, check the literature for guides that you can use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"94vs9","text":"Second, try CRISPick with the exon you want to target.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":12,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":12,"length":8}],"data":{}},{"key":"137i8","text":"Reference Genome: Mouse GRCm38 (NCBI RefSeq v.108.20200622)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9l25p","text":"Mechanism: CRISPRko","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c9ra2","text":"Enzyme: SpyoCas9(NGG) and Hsu (2013) tracrRNA","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":26,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":26,"length":10}],"data":{}},{"key":"359q9","text":"Target(s): Bulk/Advanced targets – enter up to 2000 bp","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"492so","text":"CRISPick Quota: 10","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"4DEAA1FB7CE611EF837D0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://portals.broadinstitute.org/gppx/crispick/public"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"2FEC42977CE711EF93050A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.nature.com/articles/nbt.2647"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4g62n","text":"Make sure these aren't targeting helical structures or motifs by searching uniprot (https://www.uniprot.org/uniprotkb/P55088/entry).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":84,"length":46}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":84,"length":46}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"1D75F3D37CE711EF93050A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.uniprot.org/uniprotkb/P55088/entry"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fhi77","text":"Ordering oligos for sgRNA annealing:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":36}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c5mn6","text":"Add the following bolded sequences to 20bp sgRNAs to add restriction enzyme recognition sites. We have written a script to add the overhangs for you here. It requires you to enter your gRNA names and sequences and click run on that website.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":149,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":149,"length":4}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"F52DD7FC7CE611EF837D0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://colab.research.google.com/drive/1otMrRDywz-rdhtV6wsKIJJ6bZTTXqZ8n?usp=sharing"}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bkkm4","text":"Example:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2nm8s","text":"Aqp4 gRNA FW: CACCG ATTGTCTTCCGTATGACTAGAGG","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"280lh","text":"Aqp4 gRNA RV: AAAC CCTCTAGTCATACGGAAGACAAT C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":4},{"style":"bold","offset":43,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"510gu","text":"^non-bolded sequence to add the SapI restriction enzyme recognition sites","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e19jr","text":"Set up the digestion reaction with the following components in a 0.6µL tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f6ig0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"97u9s","text":"GEARBOCS Vector -\u003e 2ug","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cj6n4","text":"SapI Enzyme -\u003e 1uL","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fpu3s","text":"NEB rCutSmart buffer -\u003e 5uL","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a7cfu","text":"UltraPure H2O -\u003e XuL (Volume will vary based on volume of vector)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ctcp9","text":"Total Volume = 50uL","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5p2tg","text":"sgRNA Oligo Annealing:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cne2l","text":"Incubate @37˚C for 1 hour and run the sample in 1% agarose gel.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1po65","text":"Elute the linearized vector in 25µL water using Qiagen Gel purification kit.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fv047","text":"Use the eluted sample for ligation or preserve in -20˚C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4o4gl","text":"Set up the annealing reaction with the following components in a 0.2µL tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ce09r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dkqk2","text":"UltraPure Water -\u003e 7µl","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9lb73","text":"Forward Primer, 100uM -\u003e 1µl ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1pjqm","text":"Forward Primer, 100uM -\u003e 1µl ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2p8m7","text":"NEB Buffer 2.1 -\u003e 1µl ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cif86","text":"Total = 10µL","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ant9k","text":"Heat to 95'C for 5 min (use heat block). Cool to room temp over 1-2 hours","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8c1ur","text":"Once the annealing is completed, add 90µL water to the tube and mix well","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"180q7","text":"Use the annealed sample for ligation or preserve the rest in -20˚C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dv6n4","text":"Ligation:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"eqi1k","text":"GEARBOCS Vector digestion:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":26}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cfj56","text":"Take 6µL of annealed sample for the ligation into pUGC Vector and keep the reaction as below","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"34nfk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e7kuj","text":"Insert- Annealed Oligo -\u003e 6uL","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"asdgj","text":"GEARBOCS-SapI digested -\u003e 2µl ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eqa91","text":"T4 Ligase Buffer -\u003e 1µl ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"du1uu","text":"T4 Ligase -\u003e 1µl ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"chh89","text":"Total -\u003e 10uL","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4smnv","text":"Incubate at 4˚C overnight and transform 4 µL into Stbl3 cells the next day. Plate 50 uL of S.O.C. medium + cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"eosl6","text":"Pick clones for minicultures.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2cdll","text":"Save 0.5-1 mL for glycerol stock and mini-prep the rest for sequencing with the U6 primer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Designing sgRNA Oligos and Inserting Guides into the GEARBOCS Vector
